titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to marriage.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

committee.subcommittee: Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 12/19/2007--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Defines marriage in the United States as consisting only of a legal union of one man and one woman.
